about_the_game:
Step again into the dangerous world of "Untrusted" with "hackers at large", in this gripping single-player command line adventure that thrusts you into the roles of mysterious hackers. Immerse yourself in a digital underworld where every decision you make, has profound consequences.

Infiltrate high-stakes targets, seize control, and exploit their vulnerabilities for personal gain. But it's not just about you – manage your crew of skilled hackers, each with their own specialized talents that will open up multiple strategies: the choices are yours to make, and they reverberate throughout the world of Untrusted.

  • Use vulnerabilities and your deduction skills to hack into computers
  • Manage your crew around the world. Hide. Escape. Don't die.
  • Management/RPG elements woven in the hacking gameplay in a unique blend
  • Set in an alternate timeline in the late 70s/early 80s
  • Realistic hacking mechanic, albeit with optional friendly interrface commands for those who don't want to meddle with a command line interface (some typing still required :) )

"Untrusted: hackers at large" is a single player prequel to "Untrusted" also available on Steam: join our Discord to learn more!
